mobility.summary: FetchRobot has a wheeled base, offering mobility on a single floor but no inherent capability to cross between different floors.

perception.summary: FetchRobot is equipped with an RGB-D camera on its head which can pan and tilt, allowing for dynamic object perception in a wide field of view. It also has a laser scanner for additional environmental sensing.

manipulation.summary: FetchRobot features a highly articulated arm with multiple degrees of freedom, a gripper with prismatic joints for grasping, and a wrist and forearm that can roll and flex. This allows it to handle objects in complex positions within its reach.
